#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,q,i,j;
	long long int st,s[5001],e[5001];
	cin>>t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>q;
		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>s[i]>>e[i];
		}
		for (i=0;i<q;i++)
		{
			cin>>st;
			for (j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if (st<=e[j]&&st>=s[j])
				{
					cout<<"NO"<<endl;
					break;
				}
			}
			if (j==n)
			{
				cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
